page.title: 15 Stanley Hall - Woodland
page.content:
{Stanley Hall}is surrounded by{150 {acres}of land, mostly{deciduous {woodland}of sycamore, chestnut and oak. There are some{conifers}such as Douglas Fir,Larch and Scots Pine.
{Some}of this{wood}is{used}by the {Stanley Hall Fencing Company}but they also{ship in}wood from{Portugal.
They have{planted 8 acres}of woodland{this year,}to be used for the business{when mature.
They{hunt}rabbits,foxes and{shoot pheasants in the{woods.}They also have {'beats'}- men go through the wood beating{drums}and making{noises.}The {pheasants}fly off their{branches}and the{hunters}are able to{shoot}them.
